settings.announcement_text: Call attention to a special discount, feature, or promotion here.

settings.caption: Advice, care, products and community for people who love dogs.

settings.footer-message: Dogologie is an online lifestyle brand and a retail store based in Fredericksburg, the heart of the Texas Hill Country. We exist to be a companion to the dog-lover lifestyle and a place where faithful friends belong.
settings.footer-message-2:
e: Email Us

p: 830-997-5855

a: 148 East Main St.
Fredericksburg, Texas 78624
settings.footer-message-3:
Monday - Thursday: 10:30 am-5:30 pm 

Friday-Saturday: 10 am-6 pm

Sunday: 10 am-5 pm

830-997-5855 ext. 3

Personal Shopping by appointment only available before and after regular store hours.

To schedule, call us or click here.

settings.slide_title: Planning a trip to the Hill Country?
settings.caption: We love ‘em, but our fine canine friends require some planning. We’d love to meet your dog; here are a bundle of resources to help navigate the dog-friendly side of Fredericksburg and the Hill Country. From lodging, to wineries, to restaurants!

settings.title: Where Faithful Friends Belong
settings.content:
An “on-purpose” caring guest experience.

We’re not just a web store or retail location, our brand is informed by the very thing that makes us love dogs. Loyalty, kindness, friendship, fun. These are the attributes that drive the Dogologie experience. We’ve done it right when we care for you as much as you care for your dog.

Example: Our Return Policy

settings.caption: A regularly updated catalog of product reviews, hilarious stories about dogs and stuff every dog-loving person ought to know about their loyal companion. The best place for faithful friends to belong on the web!

settings.title: Positions Available
settings.content: • Part-Time: Store Sales & Stocking Clerk

settings.title: Why We Work Here
settings.caption:
Joining our pack has real benefits.

We employ people at every level. Whether it’s someone looking for a full-time career in managing an entrepreneurial venture, or anyone looking to just work hourly on weekends. We are a values-centric, team of friends who share a love for dogs, people, and our wonderful town. We are unlike any retail store in downtown Fredericksburg in the way we invest in our culture, we even offer profit sharing to every employee after only 30 days of working here. Not sure what role you might want to play? Curious to learn what it’s like to run a retail business? We have plenty of room for people to explore their strengths. Just bring a heartbeat like ours and you’ll fit right in! Who knows, this could be the start of something wonderful!

settings.title: We exist to be a place where faithful friends belong
settings.caption: By being a companion to the dog-lover lifestyle.

settings.title: This isn’t just a job, it’s an experience with a great team of people and unique benefits:
settings.content:
• 1. Profit Sharing Bonus Program for everyone after only 90 days so you know what it feels like to own this brand!
  • 2. Flat organization, find and do the job you love to do.
  • 3. 401k retirement plans
  • 4.Health Reimbursement Plan
  • 5. Weekend Pay Differential to account for the fact that you're working when others aren’t (even though it’s still fun!)
  • 6.Bi-weekly paydays so you don’t have to wait for the end of the month
  • 7.Values Centric with a heartbeat

Apply

settings.title: Subscribe: Get Dogologie Curation on Your Doorstep
settings.caption:
We’re exploring the concept of doing a periodical subscription box for our dog-lover pack. If you’re curious, we’d love to know what you’d enjoy!


Learn More

settings.title: Shop our carefully curated selection of items
Dogologie Holiday Box
settings.content:
Limited Supply!

Order by 4:00pm on Dec 15 to ensure delivery by Christmas.

Not sure what to get your pup for Christmas? Dogologie has you covered. Pick from three different levels of Gift Boxes and your dog is sure to have the best Christmas ever. And we don't forget the dog lover. We've got something in there for you, too. Each box comes with a gift for the Dog Lover, Christmas Bandana, at least one type of treat and one type of toy.

Shop Holiday Boxes
